appears to be amicable. Both Larry Page and Eric Schmidt heaped praise on each other in Thursday's interview and a conference call with analysts, with Eric Schmidt describing Google's co-founders as his "best friends." I believe Larry Page is ready to be CEO, Eric Schmidt said during the call. "It's time for him to have a shot at running this."
